programme.title: Cold in July
programme.desc: The killing of a home intruder puts a Texas man (Michael C. Hall) and his family on the radar of the dead man's vengeful father (Sam Shepard).

programme.title: Hungry Hearts
programme.desc: A new mother's increasingly unstable behavior threatens her relationship with her husband (Adam Driver) and the life of her infant.

programme.title: Closer to the Moon
programme.desc: Criminals stage a bank robbery by pretending it's for a movie shoot.

programme.title: Coastlines
programme.desc: Released from prison, a man (Timothy Olyphant) stays with an old friend (Josh Brolin) and has an affair with his wife (Sarah Wynter).

programme.title: Breaking the Girls
programme.desc: Two college students (Agnes Bruckner, Madeline Zima) begin a steamy affair and pledge to kill each other's enemies.

programme.title: Queen of Earth
programme.desc: Tensions rise when an emotionally fragile woman (Elisabeth Moss) spends one week with her best friend (Katherine Waterston).

programme.title: Knives and Skin
programme.desc: In the wake of a high school student's mysterious disappearance, a collective awakening seems to overcome the town's teenage girls -- gathering in force until it can no longer be contained.

programme.title: Beyond the Gates
programme.desc: After their father goes missing, two brothers meet at his video store to liquidate his assets. When they discover a VCR board game and the last video their father viewed, they find that it may actually open a door to a more sinister world.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: A professor investigates three chilling and inexplicable cases related to an abandoned asylum, a car accident and the spirit of an unborn child. Even scarier -- each of the macabre tales seems to have a sinister connection to his own life.

programme.title: The Harvest
programme.desc: A physician (Samantha Morton) who keeps her dying son completely secluded becomes unhinged when she learns that her new neighbor (Natasha Calis) has secretly befriended the boy.

programme.title: Would You Rather
programme.desc: Iris (Brittany Snow) and seven other desperate people become trapped in Shepard's (Jeffrey Combs) mansion. Shepard forces them to play a sadistic game for a large sum of money -- but the dilemmas become increasingly deadly.

programme.title: The Feast
programme.desc: A wealthy family has a dinner party at its home in the Welsh mountains, hosting a local businessman and farmer who hope to broker a business deal. A mysterious young woman arrives to be the family's waitress, and things begin to unravel.

programme.title: Exam
programme.desc: Eight candidates cooperate in order to secure a job with a prestigious company.

programme.title: Feral
programme.desc: A wild animal attacks six grad students on a weekend hike in the woods. One by one, they become infected with an unknown virus that turns them into bloodthirsty creatures.

programme.title: The Disappearance of Shere Hite
programme.desc: Shere Hite's pioneering study of women's sexuality, "The Hite Report," sells millions of copies but also triggers ferocious backlash from the media.

programme.title: Corsage
programme.desc: Faced with a future of strict ceremonies and royal duties, Empress Elisabeth of Austria rebels against her public image and comes up with a plan to protect her legacy.

programme.title: What Comes Around
programme.desc: A love affair becomes a menacing game of cat and mouse where nothing is what it seems.

programme.title: Bar Fight!
programme.desc: Having split everything in their lives after their break-up, a man and a woman must compete in a ridiculous custody battle for their prized drinking bar.

programme.title: Pretty Problems
programme.desc: A couple on the rocks are pulled along by absurdly wealthy strangers for a wine country getaway that turns into the most unhinged weekend of their lives.

programme.title: Spin Me Round
programme.desc: Flown to an Italian immersion program on her company's dime, what starts as a romantic getaway devolves into chaos.

programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: A famed aesthetician faces a new challenge when a rival opens a skin care boutique directly across from her store. Suspecting that someone is trying to sabotage her, she embarks on a quest to unravel the mystery of who's trying to destroy her life.

programme.title: Ghostlight
programme.desc: When a construction worker joins a local theater's production of "Romeo and Juliet," the drama onstage starts to mirror his own life.

programme.title: Armand
programme.desc: When Elisabeth is called to a parent-teacher conference after hours, she is presented with scathing allegations that trigger a tangled web of accusations between parents and faculty.

programme.title: Inheritance

programme.title: Neighborhood Watch
programme.desc: Believing he witnessed an abduction, a young man turns to his next-door neighbor, a retired security guard, to help him find the missing woman.

programme.title: Sympathy for the Devil
programme.desc: Forced to drive a mysterious passenger at gunpoint, a man finds himself in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse where nothing is as it seems.

programme.title: Apex
